title: Cassiopeia Skin
body: Why make new skins for champions like fizz who already have a bunch when cassiopeia hasn't had a new one for a long, long time?

replies.body:
They gave her a Chroma Pack last year- a conciliatory compromise, I suppose.

I have three/4 skins, but disappointed by her rework.

Here are some skin ideas:

* Hawaiian/Polynesian Cassiopeia
* Indian/Middle Easter Cassiopeia
* Pool Party Cassiopeia (her headpiece could be a swim cap, and maybe her body could be more of an eel or brightly colored purple or yellow or red?)

She totally needs a new skin! I think they were waiting for her to be cool adn strong again to sell better... She feels really fun right now! I have actually made some really cool plays with her new W, and once you stack cdr, her E is still strong and her poisons hurt! her early is super shitty though...
